company_info.name: Reliance Group
company_info.description: India's largest private sector enterprise, with businesses in the energy and materials value chain, retail, and digital services. We are committed to an Atmanirbhar Bharat.
company_info.mission: Growth is Life. To create societal value by providing affordable products and services.

verticals.name: Digital Services (Jio)
verticals.description: World-class digital services, 5G connectivity, and digital ecosystem.

verticals.name: Retail
verticals.description: India's largest retailer with an omnichannel presence.

verticals.name: Oil to Chemicals (O2C)
verticals.description: Refining, petrochemicals, fuel retailing, and aviation fuel.

verticals.name: New Energy
verticals.description: Green hydrogen, solar energy, and batteries for a sustainable future.

faqs.question: What is Reliance's vision?
faqs.answer: Our vision is 'Growth is Life'. We aim to provide affordable, high-quality products and services that enhance the quality of life for all Indians.

faqs.question: How can I get a Jio connection?
faqs.answer: You can get a Jio SIM or Fiber connection through the MyJio app, Jio.com, or by visiting any Reliance Digital or Jio store.

faqs.question: What are your sustainability goals?
faqs.answer: We are committed to becoming Net Carbon Zero by 2035. We are investing heavily in New Energy, including solar and green hydrogen.

faqs.question: Where is Reliance headquartered?
faqs.answer: We are headquartered in Mumbai, Maharashtra, India.

faqs.question: Do you have an online store?
faqs.answer: Yes, JioMart is our primary online shopping platform for groceries, electronics, and fashion. We also have Ajio for fashion and Reliance Digital for electronics.
